:D[/quote]

Good job look forward to seeing server or released

item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

If you ask Hixk about the source, he will sell it for 200-250 dollars…
And then its up to you if you want to buy it or not.

Have talked to hixk a while ago and he has sold his source to some random boys and earned around 5k, so I think he would like to sell it to you too!

Read full topic

item.title: -[REQUEST]- Google.com Source? lol
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

I know of 3 people that have it or claim to have it. We have a old source that was given to us but want/need a more recent one… seems a shame just lying dormant. I can confirm that we will NOT be releasing our source to anyone as the person who gave it to us doesnt want the source going public - even in the state its in (Sorry-Nor can we say who gave us the source as that would just result in alot of messages to them- If they wish to release or go public with the fact they have the source then thats up to them).

Thanks for looking

Read full topic

item.title: -[REQUEST]- Google.com Source? lol
item.dc:creator: @Krypton1 Krypton
item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:5, topic:335380”][quote author=Krypton link=topic=431766.msg3169502#msg3169502 date=1270320091]

I suggest you contact Hixk…

He won’t release it, you won’t be able to get ahold of it I assure you unless Rusty\Luke decided to release it.
[/quote]

You can still buy it.[/quote]
From whom…? Hixk is never on anymore and the only other person who has it is Luke\Rusty, which I doubt would sell.

Read full topic

item.title: -[REQUEST]- Google.com Source? lol
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

We were given the source we have in good faith ie not releasing it or giving it to anyone… We were given it to take a look at and get working if we could… If we cant and we are allowed to release then we will but untill then we cannot .

I created this thread to see if anyone had a more recent working source to make my life easier and to see what is missing from the version we have…

If it all comes down to money(as most things do) then that could be arranged within reason - not stupid amounts - and the source would have to be verified some how before an arragement for payment could be made…

I am not the only one working on this project so i dont have all the say in it, but whatever is decided you will all find out soon and if we cannot get the source to a standard we like then we will talk to its owner about its release.

If anyone has a more recent source then please contact me on the above methods.

Thanks for looking

Read full topic

item.title: -[REQUEST]- Google.com Source? lol
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:1, topic:335380”]Ok so i have an old google.com source not the varakd that i think xent released but one with an old forum layout and point system and client.

If anyone has a more recent source - 2008+? then please contact me either via pm or add me to hotmail - Ben-rm-clarke@hotmail.co.uk and im sure we can come to an arrangement.

I know this is a long shot but its worth a try. Plus there doesnt seem to be much development happening and the source is just lying dormant which seems daft when people are looking for a decent pking server(not an easyrsc one - no offence to anyone that runs an easyrsc server).

The server i have is not that good as lots of changes have been made to it making it near unusable (code is awful) and far from the google.com everyone new.

Thanks for looking :D[/quote]

u should put up the source u got so people can see what its like even if its unusable

Read full topic
